snake_interface.py
Go to the documentation of this file.
1 """
2 This provides an interface to the snake game created in the
3 [ARC Tutorials](https://github.com/purdue-arc/arc_tutorials/tree/snake_dqn).
4 This was largely to gain experience in training reinforcement learning agents
5 and there isn't much need for it anymore. It may be useful for testing new types
6 of agents or onboarding new members.
7 
8 License:
9  BSD 3-Clause License
10  Copyright (c) 2023, Autonomous Robotics Club of Purdue (Purdue ARC)
11  All rights reserved.
12 """
13 
14 # package
15 from rktl_autonomy import ROSInterface
16 from gym.spaces import Discrete, Box
17 
18 # ROS
19 import rospy
20 from geometry_msgs.msg import Twist, PoseArray, PointStamped
21 from std_msgs.msg import Int32, Bool
22 from std_srvs.srv import Empty
23 
24 # System
25 import numpy as np
26 from tf.transformations import euler_from_quaternion
27 from enum import IntEnum, unique, auto
28 from math import pi
29 
30 @unique
31 class SnakeActions(IntEnum):
32  """Possible actions for deep learner."""
33  FORWARD = 0
34  LEFT = auto()
35  RIGHT = auto()
36  SIZE = auto()
37 
38 class SnakeInterface(ROSInterface):
39  """ROS interface for the snake game."""
40  def __init__(self, eval=False, launch_file=['rktl_autonomy', 'snake_train.launch'], launch_args=[], run_id=None):
41  super().__init__(node_name='snake_agent', eval=eval, launch_file=launch_file, launch_args=launch_args, run_id=run_id)
42 
43  # Constants
44  self._NUM_SEGMENTS = rospy.get_param('~num_segments', 7)
45  self._FIELD_SIZE = rospy.get_param('~field_size', 10)
46  self._ANGULAR_VELOCITY = rospy.get_param('~control/max_angular_velocity', 3.0)
47  self._LINEAR_VELOCITY = rospy.get_param('~control/max_linear_velocity', 3.0)
48  self._DEATH_REWARD = rospy.get_param('~reward/death', 0.0)
49  self._GOAL_REWARD = rospy.get_param('~reward/goal', 50.0)
50  self._DISTANCE_REWARD = rospy.get_param('~reward/distance', 0.0)
51  self._CONSTANT_REWARD = rospy.get_param('~reward/constant', 0.0)
52  self._MAX_TIME = rospy.get_param('~max_episode_time', 30.0)
53 
54  # Publishers
55  self._action_pub = rospy.Publisher('snake/cmd_vel', Twist, queue_size=1)
56  self._reset_srv = rospy.ServiceProxy('snake/reset', Empty)
57 
58  # State variables
59  self._pose = None
60  self._goal = None
61  self._score = None
62  self._alive = None
63  self._prev_time = None
64  self._start_time = None
65 
66  # Subscribers
67  rospy.Subscriber('snake/pose', PoseArray, self._pose_cb)
68  rospy.Subscriber('snake/goal', PointStamped, self._goal_cb)
69  rospy.Subscriber('snake/score', Int32, self._score_cb)
70  rospy.Subscriber('snake/active', Bool, self._alive_cb)
71 
72  @property
73  def action_space(self):
74  """The Space object corresponding to valid actions."""
75  return Discrete(SnakeActions.SIZE)
76 
77  @property
78  def observation_space(self):
79  """The Space object corresponding to valid observations."""
80  locations = 2*(1+self._NUM_SEGMENTS)
81  return Box(
82  low=np.array([-pi] + locations*[0], dtype=np.float32),
83  high=np.array([pi] + locations*[self._FIELD_SIZE], dtype=np.float32))
84 
85  def _reset_env(self):
86  """Reset environment for a new training episode."""
87  self._reset_srv.call()
88 
89  def _reset_self(self):
90  """Reset internally for a new episode."""
91  self._clear_state()
92  self._prev_time = None
93  self._start_time = None
94 
95  def _has_state(self):
96  """Determine if the new state is ready."""
97  return (
98  self._pose is not None and
99  self._goal is not None and
100  self._score is not None and
101  self._alive is not None)
102 
103  def _clear_state(self):
104  """Clear state variables / flags in preparation for new ones."""
105  self._pose = None
106  self._goal = None
107  self._score = None
108  self._alive = None
109 
110  def _get_state(self):
111  """Get state tuple (observation, reward, done, info)."""
112  assert self._has_state()
113 
114  # combine pose / goal for observation
115  pose = np.asarray(self._pose, dtype=np.float32)
116  goal = np.asarray(self._goal, dtype=np.float32)
117  observation = np.concatenate((pose, goal))
118 
119  # Determine reward and if done
120  reward = 0
121  done = False
122 
123  time = rospy.Time.now()
124  if self._prev_time is not None:
125  reward += (time - self._prev_time).to_sec() * self._CONSTANT_REWARD
126  dist_sq = np.sum(np.square(pose[1:3] - goal))
127  norm_dist = dist_sq / (self._FIELD_SIZE ** 2)
128  reward += (time - self._prev_time).to_sec() * self._DISTANCE_REWARD * norm_dist
129  self._prev_time = time
130 
131  if self._prev_score is not None:
132  reward += self._GOAL_REWARD * (self._score - self._prev_score)
133  self._prev_score = self._score
134 
135  if not self._alive:
136  reward += self._DEATH_REWARD
137  done = True
138 
139  if self._start_time is None:
140  self._start_time = time
141 
142  if (time - self._start_time).to_sec() >= self._MAX_TIME:
143  done = True
144 
145  # info dict
146  info = {"score" : self._score}
147 
148  return (observation, reward, done, info)
149 
150  def _publish_action(self, action):
151  """Publish an action to the ROS network."""
152  assert action >= 0 and action < self.action_space.n
153 
154  action_msg = Twist()
155  action_msg.linear.x = self._LINEAR_VELOCITY
156  if action == SnakeActions.LEFT:
157  action_msg.angular.z = self._ANGULAR_VELOCITY
158  if action == SnakeActions.RIGHT:
159  action_msg.angular.z = -self._ANGULAR_VELOCITY
160 
161  self._action_pub.publish(action_msg)
162 
163  def _pose_cb(self, pose_msg):
164  """Callback for poses of each segment of snake."""
165  assert len(pose_msg.poses) == self._NUM_SEGMENTS
166 
167  yaw, __, __ = euler_from_quaternion((
168  pose_msg.poses[0].orientation.x,
169  pose_msg.poses[0].orientation.y,
170  pose_msg.poses[0].orientation.z,
171  pose_msg.poses[0].orientation.w))
172 
173  self._pose = tuple(
174  [yaw] +
175  [func(pose_msg.poses[i]) for i in range(self._NUM_SEGMENTS)
176  for func in (
177  lambda pose: pose.position.x,
178  lambda pose: pose.position.y)])
179  with self._cond:
180  self._cond.notify_all()
181 
182  def _goal_cb(self, goal_msg):
183  """Callback for location of goal."""
184  self._goal = (goal_msg.point.x, goal_msg.point.y)
185  with self._cond:
186  self._cond.notify_all()
187 
188  def _score_cb(self, score_msg):
189  """Callback for score of game."""
190  self._score = score_msg.data
191  with self._cond:
192  self._cond.notify_all()
193 
194  def _alive_cb(self, alive_msg):
195  """Callback for active state of snake."""
196  self._alive = alive_msg.data
197  with self._cond:
198  self._cond.notify_all()
